name: Totals Invoice Layout File
summary: Learn about .TOTALSLAYOUT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A few different layouts are provided with the Totals software installation.

description: Page layout file used by Totals, an invoice preparation program; saves a document layout for generating an invoice and contains template fields (business name, address, client information, etc.) that are filled in by the software when creating a report.
